data.body: With Q since 2012 as a web development contractor, Mike joined our staff full-time in spring of 2013. Formerly with University of Michigan's MPublishing, he is a lifelong Michigan resident who is passionate about full-stack web development and homebrewing. He has a BA in Social Anthropology and an MSI in Human-Computer Interaction, both from the University of Michigan. When he's not brewing or developing, Mike spends his time exploring Ann Arbor with his longtime girlfriend, Vanessa, and their dog, Stella.
data.title: Michael J. Bondra

When he's not brewing or developing, Mike spends his time exploring Ann Arbor with his longtime girlfriend, Vanessa, and their dog, Stella.

data.body: Joined Q in 1985 after growing up on the east coast of Lake Michigan, earning a BFA in graphic design at Western Michigan University, and working in Chicago with influential designer Morton Goldsholl. Jeff has taught graphic design at the University of Michigan and lectured at the Stephen M. Ross School of Business and the SIGGRAPH Conference on Computer Graphics and Interactive Techniques.
data.title: Jeff Callender

title: Jeff Callender

data.body: A true blue Michigander who joined Q in 2000 after earning a BFA cum laude in graphic design from the University of Michigan. A huge fan of white space, Wonder Woman, and music that makes people dance. Lives in the countryside with her husband, two children, and labradoodle.
data.title: Jocelyn Edin

title: Jocelyn Edin
body: A true blue Michigander who joined Q in 2000 after earning a BFA cum laude in graphic design from the University of Michigan. A huge fan of white space, Wonder Woman, and music that makes people dance. Lives in the countryside with her husband, two children, and labradoodle.

data.body: 100% Polish! With Q since 1983 Christine received her BFA from the University of Michigan School of Art & Design. Avocations: modern dance, motherhood, and all things nature. She has created brand identities, web sites, and print collateral pieces as well as managed communication projects for such clients as The Kresge Foundation, Yale University, Simon Fraser University, Flint Group, Chrysler Financial, Clark Hill Attorneys, Hollander's, University of Michigan Ross School of Business, the Annual SIGGRAPH conference, and others. She has taught graphic design at both Eastern Michigan University and Washtenaw Community College and lectured at the University of Michigan School of Art.
data.title: Christine Golus

title: Christine Golus
body: 100% Polish! With Q since 1983 Christine received her BFA from the University of Michigan School of Art & Design. Avocations: modern dance, motherhood, and all things nature. She has created brand identities, web sites, and print collateral pieces as well as managed communication projects for such clients as The Kresge Foundation, Yale University, Simon Fraser University, Flint Group, Chrysler Financial, Clark Hill Attorneys, Hollander's, University of Michigan Ross School of Business, the Annual SIGGRAPH conference, and others. She has taught graphic design at both Eastern Michigan University and Washtenaw Community College and lectured at the University of Michigan School of Art.

data.body: Returned to Michigan, her native land, after receiving a BA in English literature from Reed College in Portland, Oregon. She still occasionally pines for the verdant northwest. Spelling bee champion. Adorer of thunderstorms, bridges, and cats. Connoisseur of chocolate chip cookies. Shameless Argentine tango addict.
data.title: Patricia Greve

title: Patricia Greve
body: Returned to Michigan, her native land, after receiving a BA in English literature from Reed College in Portland, Oregon. She still occasionally pines for the verdant northwest. data.body: The accomplished oboist (Atlanta Ballet, Atlanta Opera, Phoenix Chamber Ensemble, Windsor Symphony) who keeps us organized. Grew up in Puyallup, Washington then studied music at Washington State and Michigan. With Q since 1989.
data.title: Robin Johnson

title: Robin Johnson
body: The accomplished oboist (Atlanta Ballet, Atlanta Opera, Phoenix Chamber Ensemble, Windsor Symphony) who keeps us organized. Grew up in Puyallup, Washington then studied music at Washington State and Michigan. With Q since 1989.

data.body: Veteran of more than 20 years in the wonderful world of advertising. Draws inspiration from the fact that there's always something new in this business. Worked at multiple agencies in Toledo, Ohio and Louisville, Kentucky. Journalism major with studies in marketing, graphic design and psychology. Original plan in life was to write for Rolling Stone magazine, until the ads became more intriguing. Enjoys discovering new music, microbrews, and economic phenomena. Resides in Ann Arbor with wife and two sons.
data.title: Paul Koch

title: Paul Koch

data.body: British soccer player and digital librarian who grew up to become a founding father of information architecture. Author of Ambient Findability, Search Patterns, Intertwingled (2014), and the "polar bear book." Collaborating with Q since 1995.
data.title: Peter Morville

title: Peter Morville
body: British soccer player and digital librarian who grew up to become a founding father of information architecture. Author of Ambient Findability, Search Patterns, Intertwingled (2014), and the "polar bear book." Collaborating with Q since 1995.

data.body: Hawkeye expatriate who studied writing in Iowa City then practiced the profession in radio, PR, the Peace Corps (Barbados), and academia before co-founding Q in 1981.
data.title: Tom Rieke

title: Tom Rieke
body: Hawkeye expatriate who studied writing in Iowa City then practiced the profession in radio, PR, the Peace Corps (Barbados), and academia before co-founding Q in 1981.

data.body: BFA in graphic design. Joined Q in 1992. Four years later, emigrated to Los Angeles to open the West Coast office. Huge appreciation for natural beauty keeps him on the hiking trails. Fascination with mechanical beauty keeps him at the local newsstand, salivating over the latest unattainable automotive offerings from Italy and Germany.
data.title: Todd Szymanski

title: Todd Szymanski
body: BFA in graphic design. Joined Q in 1992. Four years later, emigrated to Los Angeles to open the West Coast office. Huge appreciation for natural beauty keeps him on the hiking trails. Fascination with mechanical beauty keeps him at the local newsstand, salivating over the latest unattainable automotive offerings from Italy and Germany.

data.body: A graduate of the University of Michigan Performing Arts Technology Program, former media consultant for the University of Michigan Health System and staffer at Guitar World and Ghostly International, an Ann Arbor-based independent record label. Web creation and production: 10 years so far. Breakdancer, hip hop expert, founder of a competitive B-boy dance crew, and lover of all things kung fu. Inspired by a glass of fine wine or a steaming-hot cup of green tea.
